medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain localized to RLQ starting 24 hours ago.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced diffuse abdominal pain starting 24 hours prior to admission, with some associated nausea and decreased appetite. They reported no emesis or fevers, but noted some chills. Denied passing gas and stated their last bowel movement was yesterday. No diarrhea or constipation were reported. The patient mentioned a similar episode of RLQ pain about a year ago that resolved spontaneously.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GERD; Previous right knee arthroscopy and neuroma removal.
